Enter a magical realm with Disney Princess Live Wallpaper, celebrating the charm and elegance of beloved princesses like Ariel, Belle, and Cinderella. Make every new tab a fairy tale come true.

🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Beautiful animations featuring iconic Disney princesses.
🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Quick access to your favorite websites.
➕ Add Custom Shortcuts: Tailor your new tab with personalized links.
🗓️ Calendar & Time: Keep track of time with a stylish date display.
🔍 Web Search Bar: Enjoy smooth and efficient browsing.
Discover more magical themes, view our Privacy Policy, or uninstall easily with the included options.
